metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12468 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An Incorrect Access Control vulnerability was found in Wikimedia MediaWiki1.27.0 through 1.32.1. Directly POSTing to Special:ChangeEmail would allowfor bypassing re-authentication, allowing for potential account takeover.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
